title: No One Came to My Daughter’s Birthday Party - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Parents   Familial Love   Friendship   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot
author: Tarakoku Chibiruke   たらこくちびる毛
description:
My 10 year old daughter said she wanted to have a birthday party. On that day, her classmates came to congratulate her. She should have had a good time. But... time passed and her daughter became a middle school student. By chance, I reunite with the woman who was her homeroom teacher at the time and learns the truth about her.

'Congratulations' for her birthday. And the word 'thank you'.
I wrote this story with special thoughts on these words.>
